mapper.select: select * from (RequestWriter)B INNER JOIN "MEMBER" m ON m.MNUM = B.MNUM where Rwnum = #{Rwnum}
select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from RequestWriter order by Rwnum desc)A) B INNER JOIN "MEMBER" m ON m.MNUM = B.MNUM where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into RequestWriter(Rwnum, Request_writer, Request_subject, Request_reg_date, Request_content, Mnum) values(seq_requestWriter.nextval, #{Request_writer}, #{Request_subject}, sysdate, #{Request_content}, #{memberDTO.mnum})
mapper.select: update RequestWriter set Request_subject=#{Request_subject}, Request_content=#{Request_content} where Rwnum=#{Rwnum}
select count(*) from RequestWriter where ${search} like '%'||#{searchString}||'%'

select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from RequestWriter where ${search} like '%'||#{searchString}||'%')A) B INNER JOIN "MEMBER" m ON m.MNUM = B.MNUM where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update RequestWriter set Request_state=#{state} where rwnum=#{rwnum}
